results.title: Effect of Ezetimibe combined with Simvastatin in the treatment of coronary heart disease: a retrospective analysis.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: The aim of this study was to explore the effect of @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@Ezetimibe@@@ combined with @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@CHD@@@).

citations.NLM: Li B, Li Y, Peng WZ, Liu YQ, Xu ZS, Wen JK. Effect of Ezetimibe combined with Simvastatin in the treatment of coronary heart disease: a retrospective analysis. Eur Rev Med Pharmacol Sci. 2023 Sep;27(17):8212-8217. PMID: 37750649

results.title: Comparative effects on lipid levels of combination therapy with a statin and extended-release niacin or ezetimibe versus a statin alone (the COMPELL study).
results.text_hl: This was an open-label, multicenter, 12-week study in 292 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (50% @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@) who qualified for drug therapy based on number of @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@CHD@@@ risk factors. @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ were randomized to four parallel arms, titrated from low to moderate or high doses: @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@/@CHEMICAL_Niacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009525 @@@niacin@@@ @CHEMICAL_Erbium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004871 @@@ER@@@, @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@/@CHEMICAL_Niacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009525 @@@niacin@@@ @CHEMICAL_Erbium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004871 @@@ER@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin/ezetimibe@@@, or @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ alone.

citations.NLM: McKenney JM, Jones PH, Bays HE, Knopp RH, Kashyap ML, Ruoff GE, McGovern ME. Comparative effects on lipid levels of combination therapy with a statin and extended-release niacin or ezetimibe versus a statin alone (the COMPELL study). Atherosclerosis. 2007 Jun;192(2):432-7. PMID: 17239888
citations.BibTeX: @article{17239888, title={Comparative effects on lipid levels of combination therapy with a statin and extended-release niacin or ezetimibe versus a statin alone (the COMPELL study).}, author={McKenney JM and Jones PH and Bays HE and Knopp RH and Kashyap ML and Ruoff GE and McGovern ME}, journal={Atherosclerosis}, volume={192}, number={2}, pages={432-7}}
